LanguageData.StoneGrass.label: stone grass
LanguageData.StoneGrass.description: This kind of grass only grows in deep and dark caves. The soft light emanating from a field of stone grass is appeasing.
LanguageData.GiantLeaf.label: giant leaf
LanguageData.GiantLeaf.description: A giant and very impressive leaf. Gathering water and mineral elements from the ground, it can be prepared as a soup.
LanguageData.DevilTongue.label: devil's tongue
LanguageData.DevilTongue.description: Local tribesmen call these plants "devil's tongue" because of their color. They also know that when their light goes down, something is approaching... threat or foe?
LanguageData.BlackLotus.label: black lotus
LanguageData.BlackLotus.description: A beautiful and very impressive plant, the black lotus slowly growths a single massive flower. Be careful as the pheromons emanating from it are extremely toxic.
LanguageData.CaveVine.label: cave vine
LanguageData.CaveVine.description: A tortured cave vine growing really slowly. Its branches are really tough thanks to the numerous underground minerals this plant absorbs.
LanguageData.CaveLace.label: cave lace
LanguageData.CaveLace.description: A rapid growing and aerial liana. One can almost see through its delicate and fragile branches.
